column2: b'Tottoko Hamtarou OVA 3: Hamuchanzu to Niji no Kuni no Oujisama - Sekai de Ichiban no Takaramono'

b'Based on the third Hamtaro game (fourth in Japan), Prince Bo falls from the sky when the rainbow disappears. Now Hamtaro and the Ham-Hams must help him bring back the rainbow. \n\n(Source: Wikipedia)'

[b'Tottoko Hamtarou', b'Tottoko Hamtarou OVA 2: Hamuchanzu no Takara Sagashi Daisaku - Hamuha! Suteki na Umi no Natsuyasumi', b'Tottoko Hamtarou OVA 4: Hamuchanzu no Mezase! Hamuhamu Kin Medal - Hashire! Hashire! Daisakusen']
[b'Hamtarou', b'Koushi-kun', b'Haruna, Hiroko', b'Tongari-kun', b'Nijihamu-kun', b'Iwata, Kana']
